extension.news: v2.1.5 (2024-10-03) - Removed the parameter 'manifest_type' for playback with the inputstream.adaptive addon for Kodi >= 21, because the parameter is obsolete now. - Fix in add_playlist_entries and remove_all_playlist_entries to handle more than 500 entries. - Show TIDAL2 addon fanart when an artist has no fanart picture to avoid 404 errors in the kodi.log file. - Removed MQA and Sony 360 from the UI - Try to detect HiRes and Atmos playback capability from the user session information if the device type doesn't contains "Hi Res" or "Atmos" in its name.
